message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn to be generous, Alice. How about a 55/45 split?
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers
Time is running out, Alice. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to settle this.
Getting closer, but I still want a bit more
This is a good deal for both of us, Alice, considering the time pressure and inflation working against you.  Don't be greedy.
